statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.ContactType , AA.Email , AA.PhoneNo , AA.MobileNo , AA.FaxNo , AA.UseYn
, M1.Name as ContactTypeName
FROM dbo.TContact AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ContactType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'ContactType' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Email LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.PhoneNo LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.MobileNo LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.FaxNo LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TContact AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TContact ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, ContactType, Email, PhoneNo, MobileNo, FaxNo, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #ContactType#, #Email#, #PhoneNo#, #MobileNo#, #FaxNo#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TContact SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , ContactType = #ContactType# , Email = #Email# , PhoneNo = #PhoneNo# , MobileNo = #MobileNo# , FaxNo = #FaxNo# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
